desc: I need creative thinking infused with logical reasoning and strong English skills. I'm looking for someone to lead a recruiting project. Basically do what ever you feel like to achieve the following goal.I'm building an online chat room for general artificial intelligence which is supposed to evolve into a startup company. There is an entrance exam to the chat room. I need someone to oversee the project of making people aware that this entrance exam to the chat room exists.The chat room we are creating should consist of people who:-really want to work on building a general artificial intelligence-already know the basics of deep learning-Can the person understand papers like “Hybrid computing using a neural network with external dynamic memory” and “Learning to learn by gradient descent by gradient descent”?-are able to commit to working full-time on this at some point-are fast learners and creative thinkers, whatever that means-Take 100 people at random. Would the person be in the fastest 3% to get through a totally new mathematical subject?I need to reach a lot of people fast. I need someone who can think creatively, look at all the possibilities, and manage this project to success. Hopefully you have native grade English skills. Maybe you have experience in creative and cheap ways to reach people on LinkedIn? Or maybe you can come up with good solutions?I would need you to make plans, for how you are going to spend the money, that I would approve (or not approve) and then I would see that everything goes to plan (I mean I verify that you weren’t lying about anything in the plan). When I say a plan, I mean  something that assures me that my money is going to be spent efficiently. The plan needs to be something that allows me to be convinced of this without out thinking about it too much. Actually I don't care too much what you are going to do or how you are going to spend the money, as long as you can convince me that you are spending it efficiently. The way I would like the plan to look like, heh, is like a mathematical proof that the money is spent well. Maybe one can even use words like, "definition of _" and "proof of _" and "the _ lemma" to get in the mind set. haha. I just mean I need really thorough reasoning that is captured in something I can read.Now as you would lead this project, there is an essential question I would like any leader to answer affirmatively: Would you hire someone else for the job if that was best for the mission? I think this is important to ask of any leader.
title: Find people to join a deep learning expert chat room. -- 2

desc: Hi Everybody!(*PLEASE READ CAREFULLY BEFORE SUBMITTING YOUR OFFER !!)(**PLEASE LET YOUR OFFER BE SPECIFIC EITHER PER REPORT OR PER MONTH !)I represent an agri-business establishment working on exporting 12 kinds of agri-products. The majority of our clients find and contact us via our website or via B2B market places.We need someone to provide us with a report at least semi monthly regarding the prices of our competitors locally in our country and also global supplier price for the same products we supply in order to keep our prices attractive and in range. We focus more on our local competitors but we also need to know the global price for our products. this process will indeed include building a data base of the names and detail of our local and global competitors by time. Let me also give an idea first about the products you will research:1- Arabic Gum2- Olibanum (Frankincense)3- Sesame 4- Hibiscus (Roselle)5- Cumin seeds6- Peanuts Kernels7- Watermelon seeds8-Chickpeas9-Pigeion peas10-Senna Pods/leaves11- Henna12- CorianderAbout the report:Frequency : Every 15 days report: Inside the report: 12 section (=12 product), each section have two parts (local supplying competitors - which is the most important / global suppliers for the same product ) and each part contains the following:Name of competitor:How did you find him:Contact method:Price offered for the product:Validity of Price:Payment method:*Please note that you may need to use a strategy that may include different emails IDs in order to convince the competitor that you are genuine buyer for him to give you a real price.** you will need to search for our market local suppliers per product using search engines and different B2B sites (We are not providing any suppliers names), and contact them for pricing. * (this survey process will create a data base of compositors names/contact details/how most people reach them/pricing/etc .. which is suppose to grow by time)*** for the global suppliers we may focus on (top 10 exporting countries) ...as the products we are listing are only found in some countries.Whoever feel the capability to take the job, please step in with his offer. Also feel free to contact me for more information.Thank you.
title: Market Price Research (Report)

desc: I'm a Director of Adrift refer [url removed, login to view]We are an online womens apparel store,wholsealer and retailer in Australia/NZ. We are currently launching Adrift into the North American wholesale market. We will then follow thru with online.We are big on social media,EDMs,facebook,instagram. We haven't found great ROI from Google Ads. To us its all about growing our data base and followers on facebook and instagram. As an own product web site we are all about being a community to our customers. We deliver great service. Our market is not age bound sitting between 25 to 80+. However our core buyer profile online is 40 to 60 skewed to the larger sizing and are known as appealing to  plus curvy. With Wholesale the core is younger 30 to 40 and more mid range sizing.We are more season and climate attractive ie spring/summer and longer summer locations.The online business has revenue projection for the 1 July to 30 june period of circa $4.0m. Our year on year growth online is 300%. We want online to continue at 100%.Look at our facebook,instagram and web site. Analyse us and tell what you can do to ensure we meet our targets. Our digital marketing team is made up of my wife as CEO, Manager - Marketing/PR, Manager- Digital Marketing, Creative & Web Content Manager, Data Management & Analytics and Web Designer/Google Ads Consultant.We are obviously reviewing our engagement with our [url removed, login to view] any move is going to be sensitive and cautious. Id expect if the right consultant team proves themselves worthy this will should be ongoing 100 to 200 hours per month plus more ( excluding USA). I would first like  to run a pitch and then continual shortlisting. The canidates will get more data as we [url removed, login to view] if you are interested let me know and ill give you one week to come up with a proposal. English language and cultural communication skills need to be excellent for it to work.We manufacture out of Delhi (Noida) and will be setting up an office in next couple of months.RegardsRobert
title: Digital Marketing/Data Analytics & Management
